name: leo-connector-postgres
description: A Postgres database connector for use with Leo Platform

scripts.test:int: npm run test:docker && sleep 5 && mocha test/integration/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:docker: docker container inspect --format='{{.Config.Hostname}}' leo-connector-postgres-integration-testor || docker run --name leo-connector-postgres-integration-testor -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mytestpassword -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:10
scripts.test:docker:clean: docker container inspect --format='{{.Config.Hostname}}' leo-connector-postgres-integration-testor; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then docker stop leo-connector-postgres-integration-testor && docker rm leo-connector-postgres-integration-testor; fi
